article.title: CSC Receives $172 Million Navy Task Order for Operations, Maintenance and Logistical Support Services
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: CSC has been awarded a task order extension from the U.S. Navy to continue providing operation, maintenance and logistical support services for the Southern California Offshore Range (SCORE). The estimated total five-year contract value is up to $172 million. CSC will provide comprehensive services to SCORE, including maintaining the entire range complex, tracking instrumentation and target resources, and planning, briefing, conducting, analyzing and debriefing for more than 1,800 training events per year.
